description: black vertical woodgrain with knot at upper center; vertical tan organic shapes at bottom center; sheet shrinkwrapped to cardboard backing
markings: on back, attached to plastic: Out of Hand Press Book Sale label; LLC below image, in red: chop mark
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
provenance: Naomi sold this work at MCAD print sale in 1991, presumably to Harry Drake
text: The print was made when the artist studied at the Minneapolis College of Art and Design and sold at their annual prints sale in 1991.
title: Waterfall
